li.label: caffeine hypersensitive
li.description: NAME's body can't handle caffeine. HECAP is extremely sensitive to caffeinated beverages like coffee and energy drinks, and will receive twice the effects of caffeine - good and bad.

li.label: caffeine sensitive
li.description: NAME is unusually sensitive to caffeinated beverages like coffee and energy drinks, and will receive 50% more of the effects of caffeine - good and bad.

li.label: caffeine resistant
li.description: NAME is used to regularly consuming caffeinated beverages like coffee and energy drinks. HECAP isn't as affected by caffeine, and will only receive 50% of the effects of caffeine - good and bad.
